job.title: Site Reliability Engineer - 100% remote
job.description: Are you a talented SRE looking for a company that will value your skills and give you interesting projects to own This company has built a major SaaS product that focuses on mitigating risk and driving business insights They have amazing document management solutions for law firms and academic institutions Lots of analytics involved with the company too They are a few thousand employees and are profitable and scaling This venture is a super exciting one  they are spending 50mil to migrate their systems from AWS to Azure Its become the ideal solution for them and they are committing to itbrbrThey are hiring a bunch of new engineers including many SREs to help them with this transition You should be skilled with AWS or Azure who have experience with Terraform or Cloudformation or any IaC tool and any containerization is a plus as they will be using Kubernetes within the new setup Everyone will be hired on a contract to hire will be 612 months as thats how theyve hired everyone weve placed over 25 people with them and have a 95 conversion rate so its truly a contract to hire Great quality of life strong benefits up to 9 401k match high PTO and great perks 100 remotebrbrstronguRequired Skills amp ExperiencebrustrongulliAWS or Azure experienceliliTerraform or CloudformationliliKubernetes and Dockerliul strongThe OfferbrstrongulliCompetitive Salary Up to 75 HR W2liul strongYou will receive the following benefitsbrstrongulliCompetitive Health Insurancelili401k up to 9 match liliRemote scheduleliliTuition reimbursementliliPet Insuranceliul Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a fulltime basis now and in the futurebrbrstrongPosted Bystrong Alyssa Vallesbrbr
